title: Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy (PC Game)
description:
Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy (2004/Multi2/RePack by Ma2012ks) PC Game



Name: Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy
Genre: Action / Adventure
Release Date: 2004
Platform: PC
Game Version: 1.0

Publisher: Eurocom
Assembled by: Ma2012ks Ã‚Â© - EmuGames

Interface Language: English & Russian
Sound Language: English

Multiplayer Support: No
Crack: Not Required
Publication type: Informal



Description:

In Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy, the player falls into the role of a demi-god, Sphinx, and the undead corpse of Tutankhamen. 
Sphinx's role is one of a brave warrior who battles fearsome monsters and relies on raw power to complete tasks. Tutenkhanmen, also known as the Mummy, revolves around puzzle-solving and logical thinking to outwit his foes.

Features:

- You have to go into an epic quest to explore new worlds, discover the mysterious secrets, chat with hundreds of fantastic creatures and discovering new abilities.
- You'll travel through magical portals leading to different worlds to destroy the evil plans of Set, and to find the stolen magical crowns of Egypt.
- There are more than 150 detailed characters.
- You can play as two characters. Sphinx - a traditional hero, strong, smart and bold, but when you need to use a special trick - it comes in a cheerful companion - Mummy.
- Have a lot of great Sphinx of weapons, including a magic sword, bees, spells and different darts.
- Interactive world around us.
- A series of exciting mini-games.

Installation:

1. Mount the disk image program Daemon Tools or similar supporting mount a virtual drive disk image format iso.
2. Install the game, following the instructions of the installation.
3. Play!

- Installation time: 2-3 minutes.
